content.title: Intro
content.content:
Stub
Scene from The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
"Don't Be Hasty Master Meriadoc!"

Details

Scene	47 (extended)
Previous	"Where is the Horse and the Rider?"
Next	The Host of the Eldar

"Don't Be Hasty Master Meriadoc!" is the forty-seventh scene of The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition). This scene was not featured in the theatrical release of The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers.
